summary: Immediately after his death, the victim of a car crash gets answers to every question he's ever had about his life, including the most import one of all - what did it all mean?
cast: Daniel Lissing|Rose McIver|Dawn Sorenson|Mickey Blaine|Ryan Anthony|Jacob Reba|Shelby Globus|Ruben Trevino|Tegan Blaine|Grant Rosen|Chad Stevens|Sam Fierro|Courtney Piaud|Angel Melanson|Jessica Camacho|Brock Pierce|Herbie Jackson|Zoe Belle|Katherine Diaz|Jackson Van Houten|Paul Miller|Bonnie Jean Miller|Jackson Heywood
title: Las respuestas
